import 'swiper/swiper.scss' import 'swiper/components/navigation/navigation.scss' import 'swiper/components/pagination/pagination.scss' import 'swiper/components/scrollbar/scrollbar.scss' import { NotePreview } from './notePreview' import { notes, useNotes } from '../states/notes' import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react' import { setViewingNote } from '../states/viewingNote' import { windowWidth } from '../states/windowSize' export const NotePreviewer = () => { useNotes() return ( {notes.map((note) => (
setViewingNote(note)}>
))} ) }
